stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains why it is not possible to use computers to solve every problem?
choicesHtml: Current computer processing capabilities cannot improve significantly.
Large-scale problems require a crowdsourcing model, which is limited by the number of people available to work on the problem.
The ability of a computer to solve a problem is limited by the bandwidth of the computerâ€™s Internet connection.
There exist some problems that cannot be solved using any algorithm.
